name: ASSOCIATION OF CANNABIS SPECIALISTS
description: A group to create and set standards in the practice of cannabis medicine.
govEntities: Office of Natl Drug Control Policy (NDCP)
sampleDescriptions: To advance legislation that allows for a medical cannabis paradigm that is subject to appropriate standards and best practices and safeguards patient care.
To advance legislation that allows for a medical cannabis paradigm that is subject to appropriate standards and best practices and safeguards patient care.
Ensuring a medical cannabis paradigm is included in any comprehensive federal reform legislation and that such paradigm is subject to appropriate standards to allow best possible patient outcomes.
